response:
<<<api>>>: Neo4j
<<<code>>>: MATCH (n:Node {language: "FR"})-[:CONTAINS]->(prop:Property) RETURN n.name AS node_name, prop.name AS property_name, prop.value AS property_value;
<<<explanation>>>: This Cypher query will return all properties of the node with the label "Node" and the property name "language" equal to "FR", along with their respective values. You can modify the query to include other nodes and properties as needed.
